name: Immortal Odyssey
description:
In a world of immortal heroes, adventure never dies…

This is the Celestial Empire, a fantastically beautiful land blessed by gods, guarded by spirits, and threatened by demons and ambitious humans alike. Here, two factions wage a ceaseless war over the ultimate prize: immortality.

Begin your journey in this epic RPG adventure inspired by Chinese myth, but unlike anything you’ve seen before!

ASSEMBLE IMMORTAL HEROES… AND MORE
• Recruit a party of heroes from four classes: Fighter, Ranger, Knight, and Mage
• Capture and collect monsters to turn them into powerful allies
• Upgrade and train your allies to become an unstoppable force

TACTICAL COMBAT
• Use tactics to maximize the power of your customized party and crush any foe
• Unleash powerful skills at just the right moment to gain the upper hand

JOURNEY TO BE THE BEST
• Put your team to the test in limited-time PvP events
• Rise to the top of the Global Leaderboard for great prizes and honor

COMPETE & CONQUER
• Challenge friends to a battle for fun or to try a new strategy whenever your paths cross in-game

DIVINE GRAPHICS
• A unique art style inspired by ancient Chinese mythology
• Beautiful 2D sprites that come to life in amazing animations
• Every city and dungeon is a breathtakingly detailed work of art
